tool_description: With the Bank Account Verification solution, you can now onboard with confidence knowing that that the individual’s/ merchant’s account details you have are genuine and indeed belong to the individual/ merchant that you are onboarding, thereby reducing the potential of fraud. Couple it with our Cheque OCR API to make your bank account verification process seamless and instant.
title: Bank Account Verification

api_list.name: Bank Account Verification
api_list.description:
With the Bank Account Verification solution, you can now onboard with confidence knowing that that the individual’s/ merchant’s account details you have are genuine and indeed belong to the individual/ merchant that you are onboarding, thereby reducing the potential of fraud. Couple it with our Cheque OCR API to make your bank account verification process seamless and instant.

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bank-account-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/validate_bank_account"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bank-account-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

import requests

url = "https://bank-account-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/validate_bank_account"
